name: Fighting On Ice
description:
Those pesky penguins won't leave you alone will they!

Fighting on ice is a wave-based shooter where the goal is to destroy as many penguins as possible. Earn points for demolishing those penguins with your trusted ice blaster, and don't stay still for too long, you don't want to freeze do you?

This was made for the Juice game jam in 2 days.
